# The `CommutingState` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

State to keep track of whether commuting is in flight or whether it&#39;s been tried for the current instruction and didn&#39;t work. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="bool"
  name={<><a href="#a6be2d27825f4630f7a2dd2db9ae236fd">TentativelyCommuting</a> = false</>}>
There are effectively three states: the initial state where we haven&#39;t started commuting anything and we don&#39;t know anything yet, the tentative state where we&#39;ve commuted the operands of the current instruction and are revisiting it, and the declined state where we&#39;ve reverted the operands back to their original order and will no longer commute it further. <a href="#a6be2d27825f4630f7a2dd2db9ae236fd">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

State to keep track of whether commuting is in flight or whether it&#39;s been tried for the current instruction and didn&#39;t work.

Definition at line 757 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyregstackify-cpp">WebAssemblyRegStackify.cpp</a>.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Stackification for an operand was not successful due to ordering constraints.

If possible, and if we haven&#39;t already tried it and declined it, commute Insert&#39;s operands and prepare to revisit it.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyregstackify-cpp/#l00774">774</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyregstackify-cpp">WebAssemblyRegStackify.cpp</a>.

### TentativelyCommuting {#a6be2d27825f4630f7a2dd2db9ae236fd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;WebAssemblyRegStackify.cpp&#125;::CommutingState::TentativelyCommuting = false</>}>
There are effectively three states: the initial state where we haven&#39;t started commuting anything and we don&#39;t know anything yet, the tentative state where we&#39;ve commuted the operands of the current instruction and are revisiting it, and the declined state where we&#39;ve reverted the operands back to their original order and will no longer commute it further.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyregstackify-cpp/#l00763">763</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/webassembly/webassemblyregstackify-cpp">WebAssemblyRegStackify.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
